about.title: Owner of Beautiful Inside Out
about.description: Hi, I'm Lizbeth! I've been a Makeup Artist and Hair Stylist for over 11 years, and I still love what I do just as much as when I started. My passion is helping brides, Quinceañeras, and anyone celebrating a special moment feel absolutely amazing.
about.description2: I'm a big believer in never stopping learning—I take courses every year to stay current on the latest techniques. Your look deserves fresh ideas and expert care.
about.description3: At Beautiful Inside Out, every client gets my full attention because I know how important it is to feel heard and taken care of on your big day. Quality isn't just a goal; it's a promise. I can't wait to help you celebrate the beautiful person you already are.

advance.q: How far in advance should I book?
advance.a: For weddings and quinceañeras, we recommend booking 3-6 months in advance, especially during peak season (May-October). For other events, 2-4 weeks is usually sufficient.

travel.q: Do you travel to my location?
travel.a: Yes! We provide on-site services throughout Chicagoland and surrounding areas within 50 miles. Travel within 25 miles is complimentary.

cancellation.a: Cancellations 14+ days before receive a full deposit refund. 7-14 days receives 50%. Less than 7 days is non-refundable. We understand emergencies happen and handle each case with care.

trials.q: Do you do trials for bridal makeup?
trials.a: Absolutely! All bridal packages include a trial session. This is a crucial step to ensure we perfect your look before your big day.

bridal-hair-makeup.title: Bridal Hair + Makeup
bridal-hair-makeup.shortDescription: Your perfect bridal look, flawlessly executed on your special day.
bridal-hair-makeup.description: Our signature bridal service includes a personalized consultation, trial session, and day-of styling to ensure you look absolutely radiant walking down the aisle. We use only premium, long-lasting products that photograph beautifully and stay perfect through every tear of joy.

quinceanera-glam.title: Quinceañera Glam
quinceanera-glam.shortDescription: Age-appropriate elegance for your momentous celebration.
quinceanera-glam.description: Celebrate this beautiful milestone with a look that captures the magic of the moment. Our quinceañera package delivers camera-ready glamour that's both age-appropriate and absolutely stunning, ensuring you shine in every photo.

sweet-16.title: Sweet 16 Styling
sweet-16.shortDescription: Chic and youthful glam for your sixteenth celebration.
sweet-16.description: Turn sixteen in style with a fresh, youthful look that's perfect for your celebration. We create age-appropriate glamour that makes you feel confident and beautiful while still being true to your personal style.

event-hair.title: Event Hair Styling
event-hair.shortDescription: Elegant updos and styling for any special occasion.
event-hair.description: Whether it's a gala, formal dinner, or special celebration, our event hair styling service delivers sophisticated, lasting styles. From romantic waves to elegant updos, we create the perfect hair look for your occasion.

soft-glam.title: Soft Glam Makeup
soft-glam.description: Our soft glam look enhances your natural beauty with a polished, radiant finish. Perfect for those who want to look like the best version of themselves—fresh, dewy, and naturally beautiful.

full-glam.title: Full Glam Makeup
full-glam.shortDescription: Bold, camera-ready makeup for maximum impact.
full-glam.description: When you want to make a statement, our full glam service delivers. Think dramatic eyes, flawless skin, sculpted features, and a look that commands attention and photographs like a dream.

group-booking.title: Group Bookings
group-booking.shortDescription: Coordinated beauty services for your entire party.
group-booking.description: Planning a bridal party, prom group, or special celebration with friends? Our group booking package ensures everyone is styled to perfection with seamless coordination and timing.

travel.title: Travel Policy
travel.description: Travel within 25 miles is complimentary. Beyond that, a travel fee of $0.65 per mile applies.

deposit.title: Deposit Policy
deposit.description: A 30% non-refundable deposit is required to secure your booking. The remaining balance is due the day of your appointment.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.description: Cancellations made 14+ days before your appointment receive a full refund of the deposit. Cancellations within 7-14 days receive a 50% refund. Cancellations within 7 days are non-refundable.
